Detailed Description

template<typename unary_function, typename param_type>
class Aeryn::Henney::function_ptr::unary_adaptor< unary_function, param_type >

A function adapter for functions taking a single parameter of any type.

Author:
Kevlin Henney & Paul Grenyer
See also:
function_ptr

Calls the function.

The parameter passed into the constructor is passed to the function when it is called.
